body.p:
Danville Ky June 18/61
P. Swigert Esqr M. B.
Dr Sir

We have organised a Military Company in this place as a Home Guard and have named it the "Danville Riflemen" -- We desire to receive Such information from you as will enable us to obtain our arms." our company wants the U.S. endfield or Minie Rifle with Sword Bayonet: can the Military Board furnish us with either of these Rifles? at What time can we get them and and the steps necessary for us to take, before forwarding our application to you -- we wish to get the arms before the 4th July an early response therefore is desired to these inquiries by

Yours truly
A. J. McGrorty
Capt. D. Rifles

Refer to Cal. J. Garrard State Treasurer
